setSpeechRate

public int setSpeechRate(float speechRate)
Set speed for the TextToSpeech engine. rate normal is 1 if 0.5 is 50% of speed(slower) 1.5 is 150% of speed(faster)

setPitch

public int setPitch(float pitch)
Sets the speech pitch for the TextToSpeech engine. pitch 1.0 is the normal pitch lower values lower the tone of the synthesized voice, greater values increase it.
